Name: SojournVR
About the game: In order to survive, you will need some good tools, weapons and guidance. Your journey starts in the caves of Labistre City, known as the Labistre Training Grounds. In the Labistre Training Grounds you will start with just some basic stone tools. You must mine ore, lumber trees and craft new tools and weapons to help you in the world of SojournVR. You will also have to complete some tasks for the experts in the training grounds in order to gain passage to Labistre City. Once you leave the training grounds, you are free to explore the entire world of SojournVR. An Oculus Rift or HTC Vive is required to play this game. Join our official discord server! Permalink:
